PORTALS

Juegazo con puzzles que te hacen pensar. Hay modo historia, modo cooperativo online con otro jugador, y puedes diseñar tus propios puzzles y jugar en los de otros jugadores. Es fantástico cómo una idea tan simple como dos portales puede tener tantas aplicaciones. También tiene un humor muy particular.

[h1]Portal2[/h1]

I decided to write this review in stages.

[b]Before playing[/b] -
 
0.79p and it's got overwhelmingly positive reviews. I would be a mug not to spend my precious money on this game. 

[b]First time playing the game[/b]

There's a talking robot head that says I am might be mentally damaged after so long in cryo sleep. Oh dear. This is also a puzzle game. So, I'll complete the game quickly and prove how smart I am. Thought I was a robot, but prolly not now I guess.

Why is there a female person running around? That doesn't feel right with the whole single-player, waking up ten thousand days after society has crumbled type vibe. Am I supposed to run after them? Wtf, this is too narratively ambiguous. Oh, I see, those are mirrors, and it's my reflection. I am a female human in this game. Definitely didn't take too long to figure that out.

[b]Next time[/b]

I haven't enjoyed a single-player mode of a game for years. But I'm only a few hours in.

There's one mighty upset AI in this game.

[b]Later that day[/b]

The decision has been made to finish the single-player and then decide whether to give it a blue thumbs up or a red thumbs down.

Excelente historia, logras sentirte tan empeñado por salir que olvidas que ¡es sólo un juego hijo!, los desafíos van aumentando en ese universo que parece enorme. Me encanta que tuvieron el detalle de tener voces en Español.

A fantastic narrative with the most awesome of all voice overs. The puzzle element using portals to move around is very entertaining and moderately challenging. Look at some youtube videos of the game and see if it is right for you, but as far as I am concerned this is a fantastic game.

Buenísimo. La historia es buena, los gráficos safan bastante para ser un juego del 2011 y los puzzles son entretenidos. No hace falta jugar la primera parte para entender o disfrutar este título, pero se recomienda de todas formas.

Un último consejo, no le hagan caso a GlaDOS , the cake is a lie.
